title: Geo JSON object
description: Schema for a Geo JSON object

id.FIXME: may be there, type not known (string? number?)
id.description: Unique id used to refer to this feature within this dataset, generated by database.

project_id.description: Project which this feature belongs to, managed by the database.

feature_id.description: Id of associated feature, managed by the database.

option_set_id.description: Id of associated feature option set, managed by the database.

workflow_id.description: Id of associated workflow , managed by the database

out_of_date.description: A datapoint is out of date if the feature, feature_option_set, or workflow have been updated more recently than the datapoint. Managed by database.
